rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 37 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:04 PM, 01 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna, Zambales, Pampanga, Bataan, Batangas, Cavite and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(General Tinio, Laur, Palayan, Gabaldon, General Mamerto Natividad, Cabanatuan, Llanera, Talavera, Santo Domingo, Aliaga, Rizal, Bongabon, Penaranda, Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Cuyapo, Nampicuan, Gapan), Tarlac(San Manuel, Moncada, Anao), Bulacan(San Miguel, Dona Remedios Trinidad), Quezon(General Nakar, Mauban, Real) and Rizal(Tanay) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
